top.introduction-1: I am skilled in developing web applications, with a focus on front-end technologies.
top.introduction-2: In addition, I have experience in developing back-end APIs and building serverless architectures on AWS.

information.skills: React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Express.js, Python, FastAPI, Terraform, MongoDB, DynamoDB, GraphQL, other AWS services

items.subTitle: Google extension
items.title: Anki Quicker
items.description: Anki Quicker is a Google Chrome extension that allows you to quickly add cards to Anki.

TDC.title: TDC Software Inc.
TDC.description: As a Full Stack Engineer, I have been involved in both in-house and client-based application development.

projects.title: Development of a New Anomaly Detection App for Machinery
projects.description: Developed an anomaly detection application to prevent failures in oil refining machinery used in refineries.

projects.title: Development of Jira Extension App
projects.description: Developed an application extension to streamline simple tasks in Jira for internal use.

AWSSAA.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate - C03 Achievement
AWSSAA.description: Due to frequent engagement with AWS in my work, I obtained the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate - C03 to deepen my expertise.

PHILIPPINES.title: Study Abroad in the Philippines
PHILIPPINES.description: I spent around 6 months in the Philippines to improve my language skills and experience a different culture.

WINOO.title: Winoo Co., Ltd.
WINOO.description: As a Full Stack Engineer, I worked on application development for various clients.

projects.title: Development of a Public DMP (Data Management Platform)
projects.description: Developed a Data Management Platform using various graphs to effectively utilize customer data for acquiring new customers and enhancing loyalty of existing ones.

SELFSTUDY.title: Self-Study Period for Application Development
SELFSTUDY.description: I spent time learning the fundamentals of web development and implementing complex features using Ruby on Rails and AWS.

projects.title: Technologies Learned
projects.description: Focused intensively on learning the following technologies. At that time, I dedicated over 12 hours a day to study.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.content: I’m  currently looking for new opportunities.
contact.content-2: If you have a question or just want to say hi, don't hesitate to email me. I’ll try my best to get back to you!
